website_summaries.verdict: A highly rated serum that replenishes skin overnight so that you wake up with a visibly bright, healthy glow.
pros: Users with dry and oily skin find this product to work exactly as advertised
Only requires a few drops at night to notice a difference in the morning

customer_reviews.title: Real Results in Ten Days
customer_reviews.text: This lightly scented and smooth serum goes on like liquid gold. It instantly melts into the skin and feels silky smooth. I have been using it for only two weeks and I can see my fine lines on my forehead melting away. They are barely noticeable now, so I cannot wait to see how my skin looks in another two weeks. I never expected such quick results. That makes me VERY happy. If anyone asks me, I will tell them just how good Olay Regenerist Regenerating Face Serum is. I am always happy when claims made by a product prove to be true.
customer_reviews.author: IrisFromOhio

customer_reviews.title: This is a favorite. I apply it in the morning and and ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 55 years old and have tried many products. This is a favorite. I apply it in the morning and and night right after I wash and tone. Visible results in less than a week. I use many of their products. Olay has never disappointed me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this product! Hope OofO don't ever stop making it! I am mid-fifties and do not look it! My skin feels great and no issues with blemishes or clogged pores! It feels great and gives a moisture content that really makes my skin glow! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: she says it's perfect, spreads well and no fragrance is ideal for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom. she says it's perfect, spreads well and no fragrance is ideal for one who wishes to use something else afterwards
customer_reviews.author: Lookingin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years. The finish is smooth and velvety. Product lasts a long time, making it very cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Deestar

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing and regenerating, as stated
customer_reviews.text: I have allergies to products used in fragrance and this is a great fragrance-free skin lotion. I had to give up all my high end face products but this is a good substitute. I think it helps with fine lines and discoloration to the extent that any non-irritating product can.
customer_reviews.author: kfer

customer_reviews.title: Made my face itch
customer_reviews.text: This made my face itch. I tried to return it but Amazon said it is not returnable. I am going to have to be more careful about what I order from them from now on.
customer_reviews.author: JLW69

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs quickly and perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, totally absorbs quickly, skin looks healthier since beginning use.
customer_reviews.author: Holli W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light weight moisturizer! Don’t really see much of a difference in skin tone/fine lines. But it has a nice translucent quality to it.
customer_reviews.author: KC23

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love Oil of Olay the products are wonderful I've used them for many years I have tried to switch and nothing it's up to the standards of Oil of Olay
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and love it. I am 76, but most people think I am much younger.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Sheehy

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for 14 years! Love how it maintains the moisture in my skin. Make up goes on beautifully right after using this.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Patty

customer_reviews.title: over priced for the size
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and light weight,wish it had some sun block as well.
customer_reviews.author: dumbo

customer_reviews.title: Great  cream
customer_reviews.text: This is great cream. So easy to apply. Recommend this
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value but a good product...
customer_reviews.text: Good product but not a good bang for the buck. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product; highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like the texture of this lightweight gel-like serum and how this moisturizer makes my skin feel.
customer_reviews.author: teal_tuesday

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've used Olay products since my teens and even as a woman of a certain age, still get compliments on my skin. I can't recommend Olay products highly enough. Wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Moisturises my face all day long. Light and not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie H.

customer_reviews.title: broke my face out
customer_reviews.text: I stopped using it because I started breaking out and usually don't have an issue with these types of products . Perhaps there needs to be a sensititve skin option
customer_reviews.author: Dawntae Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Regenerist rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Love all the Olay products. The compliments I get on my skin is all because of them.
customer_reviews.author: joanna l tomas

customer_reviews.title: ... have been using it for a week and I love it but its almost finished
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and have been using it for a week and I love it but its almost finished.
customer_reviews.author: diane mary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other products but always go back to Olay
customer_reviews.author: Lori DeBusk

customer_reviews.title: Fairly Good Aging Cream
customer_reviews.text: It works about as well as the many other creams I have used for age--not better, not worse. I expected too much.
customer_reviews.author: goldybark7

customer_reviews.title: so a serum product works great (until now)
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly... it goes on smoothly, however it makes my face very oily and I usually have dry/normal skin, so a serum product works great (until now). I think moving forward I'll pay more and stick with my Lancôme.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Favorite product!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite product to keep my wrinkles at bay! No scent, easy application and it works!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue O

customer_reviews.title: A more youthful look
customer_reviews.text: It is clear and odorless. I receive compliments on my skin all the time because it can't be detected. Makes me look 5 to 10 years younger. I like it alot
customer_reviews.author: jtw

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the original!
customer_reviews.text: Bring back the old formula! It was lighter weight, less greasy and didn't create a "layer" that sits on the skin, rather than absorbing fully. Whoever came up with the idea for this "improved" product did us all a disservice. I hope Olay realizes they're losing customers over this. I'd been using the original Regenerating Serum for years, with softer, smoother skin. You just lost me as a customer if this is the product you're committed to now.
customer_reviews.author: Seventysomething

customer_reviews.title: I am 70 years old, and women ask me ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 70 years old, and women ask me all the time what I use only face, because I don't have wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: eileen885

customer_reviews.title: Olay Face Serum
customer_reviews.text: This was a 1st time buy, just to see whether I liked the product. I have to say, that I love the silky feeling when it's applied to your skin. You can actually feel a difference immediately after you use it. It makes your skin feel softer. My grandmother used Oil of Olay for many, many yrs., so it's been around for a long time. This came quickly, was in good condition, & I had no problems with the seller. I would definitely recommend this product. I may have found something that I'll buy & use more than once! ;)
customer_reviews.author: FireSpirit Designs

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for years and it is extremely good.
customer_reviews.author: ChristieO

customer_reviews.title: Oh baby
customer_reviews.text: Looks a bit too much like manjuice but it does the trick so I'll take it in the face.
customer_reviews.author: MACception

customer_reviews.title: Olay Breakout Serum is more apt..
customer_reviews.text: Breakout alert!!! I'm 35 with relatively sensitive combination skin, but this serum made me break out extensively. I didn't even use much and the next day I had zits aplenty. I'm giving this to my 67 year old mama and hopefully it works on her skin, otherwise this goes in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: ML

product_meta.title: Face Serum by Olay Regenerist Regenerating Serum, Fragrance-Free Light Gel Face Moisturizer 1.7 fl oz
product_meta.description:
Olay Regenerist Regenerating Serum's fast penetrating fragrance-free formula is a silky, ultra-lightweight gel serum that regenerates surface cells while restoring skin’s elasticity with plumping hydration. Infused with Olay's Amino-Peptide Complex II, this formula is designed to deliver moisturizing ingredients 10 layers deep into the skin surface. After just 4 weeks, skin’s appearance is firmer. The appearance of fine lines and wrinkles are also improved. Non-greasy and fast-absorbing, it’s the perfect addition to your everyday beauty routine for hydration to achieve firmer, younger-looking skin.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Product Dimensions :1.75 x 3 x 5.3 inches; 1.7 Ounces
 * Date First Available :December 15, 2015
 * Manufacturer :Procter & Gamble - HABA Hub
 * ASIN :B019DKTUK8

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars121 ratings Olay Regenerist Regenerating Serum's fast penetrating fragrance-free formula is a silky, ultra-lightweight gel serum that regenerates surface cells while restoring skin’s elasticity with plumping hydration. Infused with Olay's Amino-Peptide Complex II, this formula is designed to deliver moisturizing ingredients 10 layers deep into the skin surface. After just 4 weeks, skin’s appearance is firmer. The appearance of fine lines and wrinkles are also improved. Non-greasy and fast-absorbing, it’s the perfect addition to your everyday beauty routine for hydration to achieve firmer, younger-looking skin.
feature_bullets: Olay's Hydrating Serum is a Light Gel Face Moisturizer with Advanced Anti-Aging Ingredients for Visibly Smoother Skin Starting Day 1
Regenerates Surface Cells While Restoring Skin’s Elasticity with Plumping Hydration
After Just 4 Weeks, Skin’s Appearance is Firmer and Appearance of Fine Lines and Wrinkles are also Improved
Amino-Peptide Complex II, this Formula is Designed to Deliver Moisturizing Ingredients 10 Layers Deep into the Skin's Surface
